text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God men garima, me uari abɨrazɨ, an akar igharazir mam uam uan akam inigha izir gumazim Semaia ganɨga ghaze, “Kɨ garima, me uari abɨra. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ me gasɨghasɨghan kogham. Sisak Jerusalemɨn mɨsoghamin dughiamɨn, kɨ an ateghtɨ, a bar me gasɨghasɨghan kogham. Guizbangɨra, kɨ men anɨngaghe, egh kɨ Jerusalemɨn nguibar ekiam isɨ Sisak danightɨ a bar a gasɨghasigham kogham.
